title: SpriteConfig
description: A configuration of the sprite display object.

url.title: URL
url.description: The url of the sprite map image file.

frames.title: Frames
frames.description: The url of the sprite frames json file.

frameRate.title: Frame rate
frameRate.description: The default number of frame per second to use for all animations. That modifies the speed of the animation.

paused.title: Paused
paused.description: If paused is set to true, the sprite will be paused at start.

loop.title: Loop
loop.description: If loop is set to true, the sprite animations will loop by default.

animation.title: Animation
animation.description: The name of the default animation.
